title: Test issue:  lz4
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install --test=all lz4
...
```

### Information on your system
```
~/key4hep-spack/environments/key4hep-release (release *)$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2301-b2fd7cb23b
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-haswell
* **Concretizer:** clingo

```

### Additional information

```
 76  ---- test multiple files (Legacy format) ----
 77 # compress multiple files using legacy format: one .lz4 per source file
 78 ../programs/lz4 -f -l -m tmp-tlm*
 79 test -f tmp-tlm1.lz4
 80 test -f tmp-tlm2.lz4
 81 test -f tmp-tlm3.lz4
 82 # decompress multiple files compressed using legacy format: one output file per .lz4
 83 mv tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm1-orig
 84 mv tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm2-orig
 85 mv tmp-tlm3 tmp-tlm3-orig
 86 ../programs/lz4 -d -f -m tmp-tlm*.lz4
 87 ../programs/lz4 -l -d -f -m tmp-tlm*.lz4 # -l mustn't impact -d option
 88 cmp tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm1-orig   # must be identical
 89 cmp tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm2-orig
 90 cmp tmp-tlm3 tmp-tlm3-orig
 91 # compress multiple files into stdout using legacy format
 92 cat tmp-tlm1.lz4 tmp-tlm2.lz4 tmp-tlm3.lz4 > tmp-tlm-concat1
 93 rm -f *.lz4
 94 ../programs/lz4 -l -m tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm3 -c > tmp-tlm-concat2
 95 test ! -f tmp-tlm1.lz4  # must not create .lz4 artefact
 96 cmp tmp-tlm-concat1 tmp-tlm-concat2  # must be equivalent
 97 # # # decompress multiple files into stdout using legacy format
 98 rm -f tmp-tlm-concat1 tmp-tlm-concat2
 99 ../programs/lz4 -l -f -m tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm3   # generate .lz4 to decompress
100 cat tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm3 > tmp-tlm-concat1   # create concatenated reference
101 rm -f tmp-tlm1 tmp-tlm2 tmp-tlm3
102 ../programs/lz4 -d -m tmp-tlm1.lz4 tmp-tlm2.lz4 tmp-tlm3.lz4 -c > tmp-tlm-concat2
103 ../programs/lz4 -d -l -m tmp-tlm1.lz4 tmp-tlm2.lz4 tmp-tlm3.lz4 -c > tmp-tlm-concat2 # -l mustn't impact option -d
104 test ! -f tmp-tlm1  # must not create file artefact
105 cmp tmp-tlm-concat1 tmp-tlm-concat2  # must be equivalent
106 # # # compress multiple files, one of which is absent (must fail)
107 ! ../programs/lz4 -f -l -m tmp-tlm-concat1 notHere-legacy tmp-tlm-concat2  # must fail : notHere-legacy not present
108 notHere-legacy: No such file or directory
109 Error 20 : notHere-legacy : open file error
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
